arts.ttl: Seattle Sounders 1-3 Atletico Madrid: Player Ratings As Atleti Dominate in Must-Win Game
arts.sum: Obed Vargas sent in a cross that Danny Musovski headed back into the heart of the box, where Albert Rusnák arrived to fire a shot that sent Lumen Field into a frenzy as Seattle once again got within one. Atléti looked intense and dangerous, finding the breakthrough 11 minutes in when Giuliano Simeone set-up Pablo Barrios, who scored a curling beauty from outside the box that hit the bar and bounced in.

arts.ttl: Seattle Sounders vs. Atletico Madrid: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid are in dire need of three points when they take on the Seattle Sounders at Lumen Field on Thursday. This is the first competitive fixture Seattle Sounders and Atlético Madrid.

arts.ttl: Seattle Sounders FC-Atletico Madrid Statistical Preview
arts.sum: Seattle Sounders fell to a 2-1 loss to Botafogo in their Group B opener to extend their losing run to three matches. Atletico were humbled by European champions PSG as they fell to a 4-0 loss in matc...

arts.ttl: How to watch Seattle Sounders vs Atletico Madrid: TV channel and live stream for Club World Cup match today
arts.sum: The Spaniards look to bounce back from a slow start
